attributes.action: Request that the government of today invoke article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details: The government are supposed to act for the people in a democratic society. The people have spoken and as such the governent should act without delay.
attributes.background: We the undersigned request that the government invoke article 50 of the Lison Treaty to commence talks on the UK leaving the EU. The government has a duty to act on the decision made by the EU referendum.
